text: Mahmoud Ibrahim Hassan (; born 1 October 1994), or Trézéguet, is an Egyptian professional footballer. He plays as a midfielder for the Egypt national team. He began his career with Al Ahly. Then, he was loaned to Anderlecht in 2015. Anderlecht then bought him permanently. He was loaned for the following two seasons to Mouscron and then Kasımpaşa. Trézéguet played his first match for Egypt national team in 2014, at age 19. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Al Ahly 2012–13 EPL 7 0 0 0 – 4 0 3 0 14 0 2013–14 20 2 0 0 – 5 0 3 0 28 2 2014–15 31 5 0 0 – 0 0 1 0 32 5 Total 58 7 0 0 – 9 0 7 0 74 7 Anderlecht (loan) 2015–16 BPL 7 0 0 0 – 1 0 – 8 0 Anderlecht 2016–17 1 0 0 0 – 2 0 – 3 0 Royal Excel Mouscron (loan) 2016–17 20 4 2 1 – – 6 2 28 7 Kasımpaşa (loan) 2017–18 Süper Lig 31 13 2 3 – – – 33 16 Kasımpaşa 2018–19 34 9 4 0 – – – 38 9 Aston Villa 2019–20 Premier League 34 6 1 0 6 1 – – 41 7 2020–21 21 2 0 0 1 0 – – 22 2 2021–22 1 0 – – – – 1 0 Total 56 8 1 0 7 1 – – 174 41 İstanbul Başakşehir (loan) 2021–22 Süper Lig 13 6 0 0 – – – 13 6 Trabzonspor 2022–23 28 11 2 0 – 10 2 1 0 41 13 2023–24 25 10 3 1 – – – 28 11 2024–25 1 0 0 0 – – – 1 0 Total 46 26 5 1 – 10 2 1 0 83 30 Career total 242 62 14 5 7 1 22 2 14 2 331 78 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Egypt 2014 2 0 2015 2 1 2016 7 1 2017 11 0 2018 11 2 2019 11 2 2020 2 1 2021 2 0 2022 12 2 2023 6 5 2024 11 6 Total 77 20 :Egypt score listed first, score column indicates score after each Trézéguet goal.
